## Background

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(faraway)
?butterfat
data(butterfat)
fullmodel = lm(Butterfat ~ Breed * Age, data = butterfat)
plot(fullmodel)
```

```{r bc}
bc = boxcox(fullmodel,lambda = seq(-3,3))
best.lam = bc$x[which(bc$y == max(bc$y))]
fullmodel.inv = lm((Butterfat)^best.lam ~ Breed*Age, data = butterfat)
plot(fullmodel.inv)
```
